name: Relapse the Neverland [Playable Demo]
description:
Discord | Twitter | Steam(TBD)  

Relapse the Neverland is a narrative driven, survival horror game about healing. Coming to terms with the past and forgiving those who have harmed or hurt, while learning self love and expression.

Heavily inspired by games such as Clocktower, Silent Hill, and Majora's Mask. Traverse Neverland Orphanage as Anna. Unravel her past by finding tools, solving puzzles, using time and avoiding monsters.

  • A unique, detailed style of pixel art
  • Explore the Neverland Orphanage, a huge creepy orphanage managed by the orphans, delivered with level design that tells a short story in every room.
  • Gameplay mechanics such as "Relapsing" and the Tool System. Giving the player multiple paths to navigate.
  • A huge amount of dedication to bring true dynamic choice to the world. With expectations to make each and every choice actually have a cause and effect.
  • A crafting system that aids progress within a horror game.
  • A living world that functions within the time system.

Time System

The time system is not just a countdown until "Game Over". Within an 11 hour time period you will encounter various events depending on the time of day, until the monsters overrun the orphanage completely. The orphans you interact with have their own schedules! You will not be able to complete every interaction or quest without relapsing. Your choices, including what interactions you choose to have will have an impact on your ending. Choose carefully now!

Monsters

Monsters will evolve and get deadlier as time presses forward. You may also encounter unique monsters within specific areas of the game, each with their own quirks that you must learn to overcome.
